sentences.en: A pronoun must refer to one and only one antecedent to avoid vagueness or ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 代名词必须有一个，也只能有一个先行词，以免造成模糊或模棱两可。

sentences.en: But it cannot account for the case when the pronouns any nearby prior antecedent.
sentences.cn: 但是它却不能用来解释代词前无明显先行词的情况.

sentences.en: Did you notice any sign antecedent to the accident?
sentences.cn: 这事故之前,你注意到什么迹象了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Events antecedent to the war failed to serve as a warning of the threat.
sentences.cn: 先于战争的一些事件未能警告人们有关战争的威胁.

sentences.en: historical antecedents
sentences.cn: 历史先例

sentences.en: It was permissible to take account of antecedent legislation.
sentences.cn: 允许考虑先前的法律。

sentences.en: Phrenology was an antecedent of modern nEuroscience.
sentences.cn: 颅相学是现代神经系统科学的前身.

sentences.en: Physical processes flow inevitably from their antecedent conditions.
sentences.cn: 物理过程的出现必然有其前提.

sentences.en: Put simply law of causality states that every material effect must have an adequate antecedent cause.
sentences.cn: 简单地说,因果法则就是任何物质结果都必须有充分的前因.

sentences.en: Some patients state that lesions develop at the site of antecedent trauma.
sentences.cn: 一些患者指出，病灶出现在先前的创伤部位。

sentences.en: Something out mind always has antecedent.
sentences.cn: 意想不到的事情总是有其前因的.

sentences.en: That was antecedent to this event.
sentences.cn: 那是在这件事之前.

sentences.en: That's an antecedent standard. Moral desert.
sentences.cn: 道德应得，那是一个先行标准。

sentences.en: The decision not to invite Joe was antecedent to his illness.
sentences.cn: 不邀请乔的决定是在他生病之前决定的.

sentences.en: The managerial nature of the word has further antecedent to French speakers.
sentences.cn: 对于说法语的人来说,这个具管理意味的词还有更早的前身.

sentences.en: The name antecedent to his birth.
sentences.cn: 名字在他出生前就取好了.

sentences.en: The user can then explore the lattice by using specified criteria, such as support and confidence bounds, or by placing restrictions on the antecedent sequence.
sentences.cn: 用户然后可以使用指定的条件（比如支持和置信界限），或在先前的序列上设置限制来分析该格子。

sentences.en: The word " man " is the antecedent of " who " in " the man who spoke ".
sentences.cn: " man " 这个字是"theman who spoke " 中 " who " 的先行词.

sentences.en: This is an antecedent of the war.
sentences.cn: 这是战争的前因.

sentences.en: We provide a Chinese layout analysis method with antecedent non _ text regions for this characteristic.
sentences.cn: 针对这种特点,本文提出了一种非文本块优先的中文版面分析方法.

trans.tran_en: an event, organization, or thing that is similar to the one you have mentioned but existed earlier

trans.tran_cn: 经历，<数>（比例）前项，<逻>前件，祖先
trans.tran_en: an event, organization, or thing that is similar to the one you have mentioned but existed earlier
